module.name: imageSplitter
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: Simply decompose an image coming on a yarp port into svereal region. Assigning a specific output port to each of them. \n

param.desc: To specify the module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name
The number of divisions in width.
The number of divisions in height.

input.description: Accepts an image to be decomposed in sub-regions.

output.description: Send the image corresponding to the x_y region in the input image. As many output ports as regions will be created (e.g /imageSplitter/split/2_2:o will send the center region with the default 3x3 division)
